sections.heading: agreements.(MBCA 7.31) (a) Two or more shareholders may provide for the manner in which they will vote their shares by signing an agreement for that purpose
sections.text: A voting agreement created under this section is not subject to the provisions of section 21-272.(b) A voting agreement created under this sec

21-273.Voting agreements.

(MBCA 7.31) (a) Two or more shareholders may provide for the manner in which they will vote their shares by signing an agreement for that purpose. A voting agreement created under this section is not subject to the provisions of section 21-272.

(b) A voting agreement created under this section is specifically enforceable.

SourceLaws 2014, LB749, ยง 73.
